title: Seadrill Subsidiaries File for Chapter 11
sub_head: The oil-rig operator said cases were filed as a protective measure to support its financial restructuring
body:
Offshore oil-rig operator Seadrill Ltd. said Sunday that chapter 11 cases have been filed in the Southern District of Texas in respect of Seadrillâ€™s wholly-owned subsidiaries Seadrill GCC Operations Ltd, Asia Offshore Drilling Limited, Asia Offshore Rig 1 Limited, Asia Offshore Rig 2 Limited and Asia Offshore Rig 3 Limited.
Seadrill said the chapter 11 cases were filed as a protective measure to support its broader comprehensive financial restructuring and will in no way affect the safe and efficient operation of the subsidiaries.
